LanguageData.VFEAncients_RangedCooldownFactor.label: ranged cooldown
LanguageData.VFEAncients_RangedCooldownFactor.descrip: The cooldown on ranged weapons for this pawn is multiplied by this value.
LanguageData.VFEAncients_MeleeCooldownFactor.label: melee cooldown
LanguageData.VFEAncients_MeleeCooldownFactor.descript: The cooldown on melee weapons for this pawn is multiplied by this value.
